name: Yan Tong
content: Yan Tong's homepage Yan Tong Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering University of South Carolina 550 Assembly Street Columbia, SC 29208 Office: 2273 Storey Innovation Center Email: tongy@cec.sc.edu Phone: 803-777-0801 Fax: 803-777-3767 Short Bio Dr. Tong received her Ph.D. degree in Electrical Engineering from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, Troy, New York. She is currently a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of South Carolina. Before joining USC, she has been working in Visualization and Computer Vision Lab of GE Global Research Center since January 2008. Research Interests Dr. Tong¡¯s general research interests are on computer vision, machine learning, and human computer interaction, especially in ¡¤       Machine learning and its applications in computer vision and interdisciplinary research such as psychology, cybersecurity, HCI, marketing, materials science, mechanical engineering, and mobile computing ¡¤ Probabilistic graphical models and their applications in computer vision including modeling, reasoning, information fusion, and learning under uncertainty ¡¤ Affective computing (facial activity analysis and eye gaze tracking) Selected Services and Activities Associate Editor of Computer Vision and Image Understanding Workshop Chair of the 31st ACM International Conference on Multimedia Program Co-chair of the 5th IEEE International Conference on Multimedia Information Processing and Retrieval (IEEE-MIPR 2022) Program Co-chair of the 12th IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (FG 2017). Publicity co-chair of the 2022 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science (IRI 2022) Doctoral Consortium co-chair and Web chair of the 13th IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (FG2018). Guest editor, Best of Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition 2017 special issue, Image and Vision Computing, 2017 Demo chair of the 6th Humaine Association Conference on Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII 2015). Chair of the 1st International Workshop on Multimedia Affective Computing (MAC 2014), in conjunction with International Conference on Multimedia and Expo (ICME 2014), July 18th, 2014. Doctoral Consortium co-chair of the International Conference on Multimedia and Expo (ICME 2014). Doctoral Consortium co-chair and Web chair of the 10th IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (FG2013).
